content.raw:
You might want to experiment with just using the ContactForce object which you get for free. It contains a single point, normal, and force but that point is the center of pressure so it is kind of a summary of all the forces in play.

The ContactPatch is cheap for simple shapes, but for elastic foundation meshes it might be giving you a lot more information than you would typically want. If you do want it though, it is cool to look at because if you draw force vectors you can see the nonuniform pressure distribution in the patch.
content.html:
You might want to experiment with just using the ContactForce object which you get for free. It contains a single point, normal, and force but that point is the center of pressure so it is kind of a summary of all the forces in play.

The ContactPatch is cheap for simple shapes, but for elastic foundation meshes it might be giving you a lot more information than you would typically want. If you do want it though, it is cool to look at because if you draw force vectors you can see the nonuniform pressure distribution in the patch.
